mapper.insert: insert into reservation (id, quantity, price, res_date, price_final, act_id, user_id) values (seq_reservation.nextval, #{quantity}, #{price}, TO_DATE(#{res_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{price_final}, #{act_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update reservation set iscanceled=1 where id = #{id}
